channel.title: Wandering Kage's.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wandering Kage's."

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded:
Posting in forums that are sympathetic to the kinds of things BvS is associated with helps a lot. Naruto forums in particular seem to do well, but more general anime forums as well. The World of Warcraft forums are also startlingly good for daily stamina.

(100 stamina is the daily cap for referral stamina. It's 5 per click, or 20 clicks)

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded:
- Referral Bonuses (+100)

May I ask how you managed to get so many referrals in just 24 hours? I'm lacking, well…. all the referral items and if there are any tips you could offer they would be much appreciated.

Plus a little extra stamina couldn't hurt, especially if I (or anyone else checking this thread) try a run at the top three eventually.

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded: Looking good Uzuki. Now I want some summons!

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded:
I'm on my way back from Imaginary now. I believe that means the dayroll to Monday (Sunday night) I will be able to app back in. Thanks for being patient while I'm a roaming.

(Uzuki <— my current stats, items, and everything I picked up at Imaginary)

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded: This is Millennium, the kage of Gaussian. Jupiah, please check your private messages so we can coordinate our villages' deal over resources, as the circumstances have changed a bit. We don't need to invade you anymore, but we'll still give you a Solid Fire as promised.

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded: I had actually forgotten about Silver Potions. I used Ultra Elixers instead. Oh well.

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded:
lol I know but this time no else had added it so I wanted to make sure it was not *hush hush* :P

Sometimes I just ask permission to make sure I am not stepping on toes.

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded: Oh, you don't need to ask my permission for that kind of stuff. It's a Wiki so anyone can edit.

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded:
lol no not that I meant the Silver Emulsion one. Was gonna add the option of potion base instead of another emulsion.
Then I was going to make a page just for the silver elixir potion. :P

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded: The Village one? The site won't let you, only the page creator can. It's not possible for me to let you edit it without letting everyone on the entire site edit everyone else's village page too.

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded: mind if I edit the wiki pages?

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded:
I was awestruck when I saw coolgai. I watched your stamina shooting up and down and your XP having random bursts. I could not believe you had not made it. to # 1 anyway at least you got #2.

How do you make those silver elixirs I used to know how but forgot.

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded:
Let me see if I can remember it all…first thing was to stack up a ton of stamina.

- Legacy (+60)
- Daily Bonuses (+30 and +30)
- Week Bonus (+50)
- 250 Sparring Bonus (+250)
- Village Bonuses and Item Bonuses (+50)
- Referral Bonuses (+100)
- Valentine Bonus (+20)
- Win 3 matches in the arena (+20)
- Blueflower Hairpins (I only had 3 sets, but that's like 570 stamina)
- Hottie Regeneration (+100) <— Use absolutely last.

Second step is getting to the point where you can get the most XP possible from Running A-Rank missions.

- Set team to Emosuke 3 (to be able to complete A-Ranks without a jutsu), Pandabear (+30% XP), and Timmy 2 (+20% XP)
- Use Anonymous's jutsu (+50% XP) every time, until you get to the point where you're in Hottie Regen.
- Captain's Jacket (+10% XP)
- Aura of Experience (+10% XP)
- Arena Favorite (+15% XP)

Those were all my XP modifiers. Then it's just the bonus XP here and there.

- I used two Silver Elixirs (100,000xp each total of 200,000xp)
- I ran 4 "all out bash" parties at the party house (two for 50,000 and two for 100,000 for a total of 300,000xp)

I also smoke bombed as many A-Rank missions as I could that weren't 2 stat challenges (the 2 stat ones give more XP). I only had 100 smokebombs though and I ran out of those very early.

There's more that can be done than this, but this is all I had access to by the time I was going for my run.

item.title: Re: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded:
Congrats. I might see you there on my new Sannin as well, or at Andromeda.

How did you get 2m XP? I couldn't manage that amount. Do you have the arena item?

item.title: Wandering Kage's.
item.content:encoded: I'm headed to Imaginary to use their Epic Monument to go Sannin. It'll take me two days to get there and two days to get back. Jupiah is in charge while I'm out, he's got Kage powers in the mean time.
